actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the sale, delivery, or other transfer of any type of firearm to a juvenile, with certain exceptions.
short_title: Youth Access to Firearms Act of 1999

summary.text: Youth Access to Firearms Act of 1999 - Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the sale, delivery, or other transfer of any firearm or ammunition (currently, any handgun or ammunition suitable for use only in a handgun) to a person who the transferor knows or has reasonable cause to believe is a juvenile. Makes exceptions with respect to: (1) a rifle or shotgun from a family member; and (2) the temporary transfer of a rifle or shotgun for hunting.

titles.title: Youth Access to Firearms Act of 1999
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the sale, delivery, or other transfer of any type of firearm to a juvenile, with certain exceptions.
